roleset.name: fail to provide enough staff support
roleset.note: UNDERSTAFFING-N NOTES: Added by Julia for EWT.

example.name: understaff-v
example.text: The move itself went okay (even though they understaffed the original pickup, taking several hours longer than our booked elevator allowed)
example.arg: taking several hours longer than our booked elevator allowed

example.name: understaffing-n
example.text: In some cases the result is because of understaffing , in some cases the staff just does n't care / know better .
